channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package arrived at hazmat cage during sunrise sort. Inspection showed package to be wet with internal leakage, torn open, upside down, and 1 of 4 items with a loose cap. Damage most likely from being placed on wrong conveyor belt. Remaining contents will be returned to shipper, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2024060545
item.description:
Report X-2024060545

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-08
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE OF FOUR BOTTLE OF ADVANTAGE CHEMICALS OVEN AND GRILL CLEANER WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OHERWISE.

item.title: Report E-2024060519
item.description:
Report E-2024060519

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: MERCERVILLE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-XTJ contacted ERTS to report an unknown product spill believed to be a Class 6.1 poison, impacting the trailer floor. The caller reported opening the trailer and discovering a noxious odor and approximately 3 gallons of liquid material coming from an unknown container, possibly a drum of unknown size and type. ERTS advised the caller to close the trailer and not to interact with the material further.

item.title: Report X-2024061323
item.description:
Report X-2024061323

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: SADDLE BROOK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATLEY 8 KGS OF DRY ICE COOLING VANCOMYCIN USP 5 DEXINJ SOL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX DOES HAVE AN ORANGE STICKER INDICATING A FROZEN PRODUCT IS INSIDE DESTINED TO BE DELIVERED DIRECTLY TO THE HOSPITAL PHARMACY. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM SADDLEBROOK, NEW JERSEY USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER X69862, BAXTER CARDINAL FROZEN DC CPAD, 500 NEELYTOWN RD, MONTGOMERY NY 12549-2828.
